org.apache.solr.common.util

Class IteratorChain<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.common.util.IteratorChain<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterator<E>
    Deprecated. 
    This class is no longer used by Solr, and may be removed in future versions

    @Deprecated
public class IteratorChain<E>
extends Object
implements Iterator<E>
    Chain several Iterators, so that this iterates over all of them in sequence.
